entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How can I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little while ago and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. I can definitely help you with that. Can you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the purchase of the VeloBand Pulse?
Sure, it's jane.doe@email.com. Look, I don't have a lot of time. Just tell me how to return it. This thing is a piece of junk. My old smart watch was better.
Thank you, I have located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 1st. Our standard return policy is 90 days. So you are well within that window.

90 days? Great! Because it's been more than, like, what... 10 days? That's all I thought I had. I was starting to get really annoyed. I've been trying to find the return policy, but your website is a mess!

I apologize for the difficulty you experienced finding our return policy information. To clarify, since it is within 90 days of purchase, you are eligible for a full refund. We'll process the return for your VeloBand Pulse right away. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within the next hour. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location.
Okay, that sounds good. So, I just wait for the email with the label?

Exactly. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process your refund, and you should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you so much for making this easy. I really appreciate it!
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
